otp.group6.view

Class SaveSelectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.view.SaveSelectionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class SaveSelectionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Class is used for the SaveSelectionView.fxml to control its actions. Main functionality is for the user to select save location for the mixer settings either locally or to the database.
    Author:
    Joonas Soininen

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.net.URL arg0,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle arg1)
        Method initializes this class when loaded, calls setLocalization(ResourceBundle) to set certain variables passing the ResourceBundle to it.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Parameters:
        arg1, - is the resource bundle provided from the MainControler.java containing the language settings

      • setLocalization

        private void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        Method sets all visible texts and button labels to chosen language.
        Parameters:
        bundle - transfers the localization data to the method so the right language is set

      • setMainController

        public void setMainController(MainController mainController)
        Method sets variable to the parameter provided from MainController.java
        Parameters:
        mainController, - is the instance of MainController.java that is in the current thread running.

      • handleCloseButtonAction

        public void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method to close the view when button is pressed
        Parameters:
        event, - handles the on push events of binded buttons

      • checkForloggedin

        public void checkForloggedin()
        Method does a query to the database and checks for logged in user If there is a user logged in the SaveMixerSettingsView.fxml is opened trough the MainController.java or the RegisterLoginView.fxml is opened. Closes this stage automatically.

      • saveLocal

        public void saveLocal()
        Method calls for local save method that is in MainController.java.
